summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement for the construction, operation and maintenance of a sewer line and pump station over the City of Seattle, City Light Department, P.S.E. transmission line fee owned right of way in the southwest quarter of the southwest quarter of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington (P.M. \#230403-3-303).
